state_summary: Hyper, an AI voice company, raises $6.3 million to help automate 911 calls by reducing non-emergency call wait times and improving call-taker efficiency.
evidence: Ben Sanders launched Hyper after reading a news article about using AI to reduce emergency services wait time
Sanders teamed up with his friend Damian McCabe to officially launch Hyper on Monday
Hyper's product can handle some 911 calls, focusing on non-emergency calls that take away from critical calls
keywords: AI voice company, Hyper, 911 calls, emergency response startup

metadata.investor_name: Eniac Ventures, Ripple Ventures, GreatPoint Ventures, VSC Ventures, Tusk Venture Partners, K5 Global
